## Loading data

This package is required to be able to read the data

```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)

```

```{r}
data <-read.csv("C:/Users/Zhang/Documents/GitHub/SRICode_Repo/RGraphsInto/104lineage.csv")
```

# Graphs Yippee

```{r}
boxplot(mCherry_Integrated_Intensity~Tracking_ID, data)

boxplot(mCherry_Mean_Intensity~Tracking_ID, data)


```

```{r}
# Create a color palette with as many colors as unique Tracking_IDs
color_palette <- brewer.pal(length(unique(data$Tracking_ID)), "Set3")

# Create a ggplot with geom_point
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = Dry_Mass, y = mCherry_Mean_Intensity, color = factor(Tracking_ID))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  labs(title = "Dry Mass vs Mean Intensity")

ggplot(data = data, aes(x = Dry_Mass, y = mCherry_Integrated_Intensity, color = factor(Tracking_ID))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  labs(title = "Dry Mass vs Integrated Intensity")
```

```{r}

ggplot(data = data, aes(x = Volume, y = mCherry_Mean_Intensity, color = factor(Tracking_ID))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  labs(title = "Volume vs Mean Intensity")

ggplot(data = data, aes(x = Volume, y = mCherry_Integrated_Intensity, color = factor(Tracking_ID))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  labs(title = "Volume vs Integrated Intensity")

```
